name: .NDK File Extension
summary: Learn about .NDK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Contains Lotus Notes design elements, which are used to create and customize the interface for Lotus users; "DESKTOP6.NDK" contains design elements, while "CACHE.NDK" stores recently used elements.

content: Previous versions of Lotus Notes used the .DSK extension for design elements files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
